sentences.en: A drop of ditch - water harboured a whole community of innumerable tiny creatures.
sentences.cn: 一滴污水中藏有各种难以计数的微生物.

sentences.en: Both lungs will have innumerable metastatic foci and lymphangitic involvement.
sentences.cn: 双侧肺内出现无数的转移病灶和淋巴管性播散.

sentences.en: He read widely, and wrote innumerable reviews and articles.
sentences.cn: 他涉猎甚广, 书评和论文也洋洋可观.

sentences.en: In the endless flow of absolute truth there are innumerable relative truths.
sentences.cn: 在绝对真理的长河中有无数相对真理.

sentences.en: Innumerable books have been written on the subject.
sentences.cn: 已经有无数书籍写过这个主题。

sentences.en: Innumerable small shops presented a collection of cheap plastic goods.
sentences.cn: 数不清的小商店里陈列着一批廉价的塑料制品.

sentences.en: Obviously they must go to sea and vanish among the innumerable islands.
sentences.cn: 显然,它们必须出海并隐没在无数的岛屿之间.
她在多个委员会担任委员。

sentences.en: Technological innovations have brought innumerable benefits.
sentences.cn: 技术革新已经带来了无穷的好处.

sentences.en: The apparent simplicity of this concept conceals innumerable snags.
sentences.cn: 这种表面很简单的概念却隐藏着无数的暗礁.

sentences.en: The innumerable stars in the sky are too far from us.
sentences.cn: 天上无数的星星离我们太远了.

sentences.en: The sunlight, filtering through innumerable leaves, was still hot on their faces.
sentences.cn: 阳光透过成千上万片树叶, 照在他们脸上,那感觉还是热烘烘的.

sentences.en: There are innumerable stars in the sky.
There are innumerable variations in the arrangement of blood vessels.
sentences.cn: 血管的排列有无数的变异.

sentences.en: There were also innumerable examples of bad taste.
sentences.cn: 另有许多败人兴致的东西.

sentences.en: Today, the uses of aluminum are innumerable.
sentences.cn: 今天铝的用途多得不可胜数.

trans.tran_cn: 无数的，数不清的，指不胜屈，不可胜数，无可胜数
trans.tran_en: very many, or too many to be counted
